1. Choose "Playlist name" to open a certain playlist 
 2. Search button helps you find song, artist, playlist, album 
 3. Settings button is for sending feedback 
 Challenges: creating different algorithms for most played, favorites, recently added and custom playlists

1. Play the whole playlist or choose a particular song


Classes/Libraries: 
 a) ContentResolver class to retrieve tracks on the device
 b) MediaPlayer class to play audio
 c) MediaController class to control playback
 d) Android manifest permissions: WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE and READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE
 e) nextRandomInt for generating random Android studio shortcuts from the list

1. Choose "Song name" to play a certain song 
 2. Search button helps you find song, artist, playlist, album 
 3. Settings button is for sending feedback 
 Challenges: allow app to access media files from phone/sd card, custom list adapter for list of all songs

1. Choose "Artist name" to play a open a certain artist 
 2. Search button helps you find song, artist, playlist, album 
 3. Settings button is for sending feedback

1. Plays chosen songs from the playlist. 
 2. Skip or go to previous song. Set on repeat, add to favorites. 
 3. Android shortcut tip is shown randomly every time you open a song
